column5: Pet friendly with fenced yard. Very safe neighborhood. Great park in walking distance.ACL, SXSW, Circuit Of America,Waves Surfing Park, 45 minutes - 1/2 hr away. Washer and dryer, parking, Good Bar-B-Q and Tex-Mex, eclectic bars, live music nearby.
column8: TX small town charm, 30 min Austin
